question: After the death of Amogahvarsha II, which of the following kings ascended to the throne of the Rashtrakuta empire?
explanation: According to the Kalasa record of Chikmagalur, Govinda IV was the younger brother of Amoghavarsha II. He became the Rashtrakuta emperor in 930 after assassinating his brother and then ruled the Rashtrakuta empire from 930A.D. to 935 A.D.
